thread.title: The Star Wars News Roundup for March 2, 2017
thread.title_full: The Star Wars News Roundup for March 2, 2017

author: Scott Chitwood
title: The Star Wars News Roundup for March 2, 2017
text:
— Jedi News (@JediNewsUK) February 25, 2017 
Mocking the poster art w/ hotel room items: Harrison (hairdryer/pistol) me (candlestick/lightsaber) Carrie (pastry/hair buns) #WhySoSerious ? https://t.co/wsuI0D9pd5 
— Mark Hamill (@HamillHimself) February 25, 2017 Good 1 @joshgad LOL! Loved you mercilessly probing #DaisyRidley 4 spoilers-Next time try the peach schnapps-She’ll spill her guts! #WaitFor8 https://t.co/x7bPxHoMtA 
— Mark Hamill (@HamillHimself) February 25, 2017 
J.J. Abrams Says Mark Hamill is Underrated, Praises The Last Jedi and the Han Solo Film! – #StarWars – https://t.co/f6ObKX8Tbe pic.twitter.com/Q7413aTHJO 
— SWNN (@StarWarsNewsNet) February 25, 2017 Rogue One News and Rumors 
— Star Wars (@starwars) March 1, 2017 
Doug Chiang Talks With American Cinematographer About ‘Rogue One’ (Part 2) – https://t.co/O2lqSB0xu1 #StarWars @AmericanCine pic.twitter.com/Ym7C365TTA 
— Jedi News (@JediNewsUK) February 27, 2017 John Knoll On ‘Rogue One’s Visual Effects: Part 2 – https://t.co/S2k0Kg6tzW #StarWars @americancine pic.twitter.com/a5uuiMK75N 
— Jedi News (@JediNewsUK) February 28, 2017 Television News and Rumors 
— Star Wars (@starwars) February 25, 2017 Thrawn’s office on Star Wars Rebels was full of Easter eggs https://t.co/ybRUT23miw pic.twitter.com/YtYteTuviv
